<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>false</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>sn_wsd_core_reservation</collection> <condition>javascript: gs.getSession().isInteractive() == true</condition> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition table="sn_wsd_core_reservation">source_reservationISEMPTY^is_parent=true^sys_class_name=sn_wsd_core_reservation^EQ<item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/> </filter_condition> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Create Child Reservations Async</name> <order>200</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {
var eventMsg = new WPReservationUtils().createChildReservations(current);
//Fire email notification for uncreated Reservations if (!gs.nil(eventMsg) && gs.nil(current.workplace_request)) gs.eventQueue('sn_wsd_core.notify_uncreated_reservation', current, eventMsg, null);
})(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-05-24 07:20:23</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>020ba618070110102648e7a30ad3008c</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>28</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Create Child Reservations Async</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="">a208b07253201010b10bddeeff7b1281</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="">a208b07253201010b10bddeeff7b1281</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_020ba618070110102648e7a30ad3008c</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-04-26 13:59:14</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>async</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=020ba618070110102648e7a30ad3008c"/> </record_update>
